pages.title: Wisent
pages.text: It is one of two extant species of bison, alongside the American bison.$(br2)The European bison is the heaviest wild land animal in Europe, and individuals in the past may have been even larger than their modern-day descendants.

pages.title: Wisent
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:wheat$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 10 Days
